---
    title: "Testing the empirical validity of the Kuznets environmental
curve on 18 countries from Asia and Oceania using panel
regression methods"
    author: "Gabriel Ammour & Noa Le Roux" 
    date: "2024-12-30"
    format: 
      html: 
        toc: false
    engine: knitr
    freeze: false    
    slides:
       pdf: "kuznet_curve.pdf"

This paper was produced as part of the ‘Panel Data Econometrics’ course presented by [François-Charles WOLFF](https://sites.google.com/site/francoischarleswolff/wolff-francois-charles). The aim of the course was to acquire the skills needed to carry out econometric analyses of panel data using Stata software.
